CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 4, 1950, pg. 8, reads: "The Kolesque - This group of lovely young ladies, members of the popular Kolesque Club, surround their calendar for 1950. Top row, left to right: Kathleen Douglass, Denise Thomas, Elinor Bowles, Jean Holland and Audrey Moore.  Second row: Jackie Smith, Beatrice Scott, Joan Ryan and Geraldine Wouldridge.  Third row: Adelaide Biggs and Joan Bruce.  Fourth row: Geraldine Smith, Betty Scott, president; Mrs. Oneil Bolden, sponsor; Rebecca West and Janice Pack.  Kolesque Kalendar for 1950: Feb. - Skate and Dance Party; March - Koronation Ball; May - Balloon Ball; June - Snow Ball (Invitational Formal); August - Kountry Kaboodle; Dec. - A Midnight Masquerade... - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Kathleen Douglass (Hurst) wearing light colored short sleeved sweater and necklace of three strands of pearls, posed in front of light colored background with parted dark curtains, in Harris Studio
